Bangladesh holds general election on SundayBangladesh holds a general election on Sunday, with Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina set to win a fourth straight term and the fifth overall for her Awami League-led alliance, despite an economy that required an international bailout last year. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 08:26:38 GMT OLIVL5GMDNMXRHOK4RJQX5YP7I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-holds-general-election-sunday-2024-01-06/Ruma Paul, Sudipto Ganguly世界亚太地区
Hezbollah says it hit Israeli observation post with 62 rocketsLebanese armed group Hezbollah said it hit a key Israeli observation post early on Saturday with 62 rockets as a "preliminary response" to the killing of Hamas' deputy chief earlier this week. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 08:14:23 GMT LO5D42O6A5OAJLNETMCNDV3FFI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-says-it-hit-israeli-observation-post-with-62-rockets-2024-01-06/Reuters世界中东地区
Iran Guards commander challenges 'enemy' naval presence in regionThe commander of Iran’s Revolutionary Guards vowed on Saturday to reach "the enemy" far and near as tensions soar on key shipping routes where Tehran’s allies have been attacking vessels. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 07:28:08 GMT 5GRSU22ONNOK5JZWSRO7WUB4NY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-guards-commander-challenges-enemy-naval-presence-region-2024-01-06/Reuters世界中东地区
War, weather put ocean shippers on notice for rough seas in 2024Recent hostilities in the Red Sea have thrown global shippers of vital goods for a loop. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 06:07:42 GMT NTEZIPKYZJK3JPKOLI4OIOXNCM https://www.reuters.com/world/war-weather-put-ocean-shippers-notice-rough-seas-2024-2024-01-06/Lisa Baertlein世界
Myanmar rebels take control of key town near Chinese borderA Myanmar rebel alliance has gained control of a key town along the country's volatile northern border with China after weeks of fierce fighting with junta troops, the alliance and the junta said. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 05:51:48 GMT KWDCKJMJXZLJXAELVKUN7RDWSE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-rebels-take-control-of-key-town-near-chinese-border-2024-01-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan earthquake death toll tops 100 with hundreds still missing -mediaThe death toll from Japan's New Year's Day earthquake topped 100 on Saturday with more than 200 people still missing, the country's deadliest quake in nearly eight years. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 05:34:14 GMT 5AIRWFA2RICLACY6HYM2X2PFU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-earthquake-death-toll-tops-100-with-hundreds-still-missing-media-2024-01-06/Kiyoshi Takenaka世界亚太地区
Epstein invoked 5th Amendment right to silence 600 times - court filingsThe late financier Jeffrey Epstein invoked his constitutional right against incriminating himself about 600 times in testimony for a lawsuit brought by Virginia Giuffre, who accused him of sexual abuse. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 04:51:10 GMT FBDNHVDWXJO7C2KXF56JYY https://www.reuters.com/legal/epstein-invoked-5th-amendment-right-of-silence-600-times-court-filings-2024-01-06/Jonathan Stempel合法的
New aircraft glitch for Canada's Trudeau before return from JamaicaCanada said on Friday an aircraft was sent this week to Jamaica to address a maintenance issue with the plane that took Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on a visit to the Caribbean, enabling him to fly back home. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 04:15:34 GMT L3AJV3RQKZMJJNS7F7NCKAOPJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/new-aircraft-glitch-canada-trudeau-before-returning-jamaica-2024-01-06/Reuters世界
Bangladesh poll booths burn on election eve, as train arson kills fourPolling booths were set ablaze in Bangladesh on the eve of Sunday's general elections, while four people, two children among them, were killed in a train fire that the government decried as arson targeting democratic values. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 03:44:08 GMT 7AFRZEYQ5BMPZIIAOJZIUB3TBA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ateast-four-dead-suspected-train-arson-in-bangladesh-before-election-2024-01-06/Ruma Paul, Sudipto Ganguly世界亚太地区
Taiwan slams Chinese balloons as safety threat, psychological warfareTaiwan's defence ministry accused China on Saturday of threatening aviation safety and waging psychological warfare on the island's people with a recent spate of balloons spotted near or over the island, days before key Taiwanese elections. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 02:37:58 GMT BA7HT7TNUBKDPBZ37UXTP6IXDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-chinese-balloons-threaten-aviation-safety-2024-01-06/Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
S.Korean minister says U.S. troops likely to stay even if Trump is re-electedThe United States is unlikely to cut back its forces in South Korea even if former U.S. president Donald Trump wins re-election, the South's minister tasked with matters related to neighbouring North Korea said in a television interview. Sat, 06 Jan 2024 02:20:03 GMT 2AKORV22UJKANGW7GELAAJ36GI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/skorean-minister-says-us-troops-likely-stay-even-if-trump-is-re-elected-2024-01-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
